StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Name: Hero Event
StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Description: The hero whom you once defeated appears again. Win the battle and be rewarded with rare rewards.

StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Name: Find the Treasure Thief
StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Description: Golden Goblins often hide away hoarding rare materials.

StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Name: Monster Lair
StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Description: Win the battle and be rewarded with rare rewards.

StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Name: Find the Scholars
StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Description: Senior scholars teach travelers how to travel farther.

StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Name: Discover a Treasure Chest
StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Description: Most people choose to pick these up.

StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Name: Outland Crystal Altar
StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Description: Outland Crystal Altar, you can get Outland Crystals here.

StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Name: Haunted Graveyard
StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Description: Haunted by the dead, try not to disturb them unless you want to be cursed.

StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Name: Guide
StackHeadExploreTempInfo.Description: Randomly teleports you to an exploration spot.
